page.title: 18SPORT AND RECREATION
page.content: The east side of Braintree has some organised recreational facilities.The sports ground and King George V playing fields off Cressing Road are used by football teams from various clubs and leagues,with Braintree Town Football Club playing at the sports ground. The old open air swimming pool at Rose Hill has closed and the new Riverside complex has been open several years. This offers inside swimming pools squash courts and rooms for other keep fit activities.Many of the local schools use the pools where the pupils receive tutition. Other sport and recreation grounds can be found off Coggeshall Road and are used by local schools. A golf course can be found in the grounds of Stisted Hall.
